Package org.junit.jupiter.api

Annotation Type Nested


  • @Target(TYPE)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Documented
@API(status=STABLE,
     since="5.0")
public @interface Nested
    @Nested is used to signal that the annotated class is a nested, non-static test class (i.e., an inner class).
    Since:
    5.0
    See Also:
    Test, TestInstance
